channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15270] Use appropriate encoding for "filter" field in TaskMonitorTmpl.jamon
item.description:
In TaskMonitorTmpl.jamon we have this line


<li><a href="?format=json&filter=<% filter %>">View as JSON</a></li>

which is allowing "filter" parameter to take arbitrary value. I suggest that we encode this value for HTML.
item.summary: Use appropriate encoding for "filter" field in TaskMonitorTmpl.jamon

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Here is patch.

why encodeForHTML, not encodeForURL?

Thanks for review Heng Chen,
Good point, encodeForURL is better choice for this field, let me create new patch.
Here is new patch, trying to encodeForURL if fails it will encodeForHTML.

TestHRegion failure is not your fault.

I was going to ask if we should do any escaping w/ the new fancy stuff added by a certain Samir Ahmic over in HBASE-15122? ... but looking at the patch I see you do this already. +1 on patch.
+1 on patch v1. push to master, branch-1.1, branch-1.2
What's up? Sean Busbey

reverted and reapplied with correct commit message on master, branch-1.2, and branch-1.1. applied missing commit with correct commit message to branch-1.

filed YETUS-311 to add a precommit check to verify the jira referenced in the commit message.
Just rechecking commits as I prepare to update things for the next 1.2.0 RC. all done now!
Oh! Thanks Sean Busbey, my fault, i did not check it carefully.
